item.title: 【Singles (lossless)】FLAC - Take That - Relight My Fire (Remixes) [16bit 44100kHz]
item.description:
From various sources (most are cd rips, one is a cleaned vinyl transfer). Seen some chumpstains take free stuff from Sharemania & lock them behind trade-walls on other sites & platforms like Soulseek, like my own lossless copy of "Serenity" which I posted here a few weeks ago, and lossless copies of rare mixes like "Love to Infinity" and the Joey Negro club mixes just so they can fatten up their own music collection.

So I'm giving them away.

Relight My Fire (Album Version)
Relight My Fire (All Night Mix)
Relight My Fire (Element 2006 Remix)
Relight My Fire (Full Length)
Relight My Fire (Joey Negro Club Vocal Mix)***
Relight My Fire (Joey Negro Dub Mix)***
Relight My Fire (Late Night Mix)
Relight My Fire (Love To Infinity Remix)*
Relight My Fire (Night Beats)
Relight My Fire (Odyssey Remix)
Relight My Fire (Percappella) [vinyl rip]

*** there are "different" rips out there labelled as "Club mix" and "Vocal mix" but they're the same version. The second version on the cd is actually a "Dub" mix with a duration of 8:04. The vocal mix has a duration of 7:43.

* the "Love to Infinity" mix is often titled as "DMC Classic Mix".

Decode at https://www.base64decode.org/

item.author: KingOfHell1661
